website_summaries.verdict: Successful backpack style design in a baseball bag that features a reasonable price point.
pros: Designed to hold all of your baseball or softball gear, including two exterior pockets for bats
Has a ventilated pocket that works for shoes or a helmet
Includes a fence clip for convenience
Material over the main pocket can be embroidered with your team logo or player's name
Has a valuables pocket that's lined with felt
cons: A little smaller than some other baseball bags

customer_reviews.title: She love that you can carry it on your back instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this is described as a backpack for softball, my daughter uses it for volleyball and loves it! A lot of compartments to store shoes, knee pads, etc. She love that you can carry it on your back instead of a duffle bag.
customer_reviews.author: MN Mom

customer_reviews.title: This bag earns 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This size and function meet the needs of our 9 year old. The bag is big enough, but not oversized. She takes this bag to school for practice after school and it fits everything she needs. Cleats, clothes, 2 mitts, face mask, helmet, 2 bats, 2 water bottles, snacks, sunglasses. It's well designed and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kaintoch

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, performs good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, performs good. Bought it for one kid and the Louisville Slugger series 7 for another. Like the Louisville better, but only because of the neoprene bat sleeves. Both are great. Mizuno is a little cleaner looking, Louisville Slugger has better bat retention and holds more stuff. My larger son got it. My bony skeleton like son got this one. Similar in ways to the Mizuno Omega series golf bag I've had for over 10 years. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bassham

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these, 1 in pink, and 1 in blue for my softball and baseball players over the last year. They love them. Everything fits. Not too big for a kid, but a good size for an adult as well. The bags do get tossed around quite a bit, and have handled it nicely. No rips. Zippers work well. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use for her Volleyball games & practices. I love this bag! It holds her volleyball, knee pads, volleyball shoes, sweat pants & a hoodie! Love the pocket for her cell phone. This bag holds it all & stores nicely to be able to grab and go when we need it!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Room
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room to hold a helmet in the bottom front zipper pocket, with other items going in the main zipper area. The top pocket is lined with a fleece like material, perfect for sunglasses. Great heavy-duty construction and materials, nice big size, and red/black goes with so many different team colors. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: esmith

customer_reviews.title: Large Size, Holds Fielder's Mask and Batting Helmet, Glove, Balls, Cleats, 4 Bats +More! Cardinal Backpack is a Shimmery Maroon.
customer_reviews.text: I've got 2 little ones (<10yo) in softball and although large in size these backpacks can easily be adjusted. It easily holds their batting helmet with guard, fielder's mask, glove, cleats (in front 3 hole breathable section), and their individual bats (could easily hold 4 total). We could even throw in some softballs and change of clothes if needed. The cardinal/black backpack matches their team color of maroon and most of the others have Easton backpacks which hold less.
customer_reviews.author: Juan J Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my 16 year old whom plays travel softball. She used it for one year until the team purchased everyone matching gear bags. Great pockets and love how the bats are held in with velcro straps instead of other bags. It is now used as a back up gear bag/uniform bag. Great size! Love the look. Made well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be my daughter’s volleyball bag for her tournaments. She loves it. Most of the other players ended up buying one, too.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: great bag, lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: ordered these for our entire baseball team and they are all still using. great bag, lots of pockets, nice backpack style. perfect for our 9-11 year old team and can see older boys using these as well
customer_reviews.author: shoemama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter this past high school season. It's very good quality and she loves it. I knocked off one star as I had hoped it would be just a little bit roomier. It's a bit of tight fit for helmet, face guard, cleats, change of clothes and a snack. Bat and water bottle can fit on the outside of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product !!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today, just as described, fast shipping, this thing is awesome, my grandson Love's it, great seller will definitely buy from again! !
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backpack. My daughter uses it for volleyball and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack. My daughter uses it for volleyball and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: FabFoster5ive

customer_reviews.title: Great bag & great value
customer_reviews.text: This bag is used for volleyball. Great compartments. Separate shoe area. Enough space for equipment, snacks, water bottles, etc.
customer_reviews.author: K. TENNANT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Holds my glove, face mask, hat and shoes with plenty of room left over. I love that my shoes have their own separate compartment so they don't get dirt everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Great Back - Purchased for Volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Bag is a decent size. I purchased to use for womens volleyball. I find the backpack has plenty of room for a change of clothes and I like having my shoes in a separate compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it for her volleyball gear and it matched the teams colours. Thx.
customer_reviews.author: Shalen D. Plaisier

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my daughter. It fits her helmet, cleats, glove, batting gloves with room to spare. She has used this bag for the past 6 months 3 to 4 days a week with absolutely no issue. I would highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag, Mizuno Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a much more solid bag than those we have used in the past at a lower price. Can easily carry two bats, glove, helmet and some accessories with plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cool but small for an adult
customer_reviews.text: cool but small for an adult, my cleats and glove dont really fit size 13 shoes, great for kids tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great look and fit everything the boys needed through tournament season.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best softball bag I've found!
customer_reviews.text: Best softball bag we have purchased yet! I got it to have embroidery on the front since it has a large solid space on the front. Turned out perfect and has been very durable. It's lasted 2 seasons so far
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Great softball bag for my 11 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great softball bag for my 11 year old daughter. Holds everything including her glove and helmet. Smaller pockets great for gum, water bottle and batting gloves. Bats stay put in pockets.
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag! My daughter just finished a season with his bag and seems like it will las a long time. Not as purple as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great, rugged bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 8 year old son's helmet, glove, bats, balls with room to spare. Great, rugged bag!
customer_reviews.author: washingtonbc

customer_reviews.title: But is very happy otherwise
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack for volleyball. It has lots of room for her shoes and equipment. She likes the space for water outside the backpack. She wished it had a separate compartment inside to separate her shoes from the other things and a pocket designed to keep her phone safe. But is very happy otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, excellent communication, and the Mizuno Organizer Bat Pack is fantastic. Very compact but can store alot of my necessary equipment I use for my softball games with some extra space. Yes it can hold 4 Bats or you can also use the bat slots for your water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Walkley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell once baseball season hits, but right now they look solid.
customer_reviews.author: 4Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Made well
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Made well, lots of space & no elastic to hold bat in place (that got stretched out on my daughters other bag). There's an adjustable clip to hold the bat upright.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bechtold

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room in this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very suprised how much room is in this bag! My daughter has 2 bats, helmet with face mask, fielders face mask, glove, 2 softballs, cleates, sandals, visor, AND sunglasses. Pleasantly suprised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 14 year old son to carry his baseball equipment in.
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my wife for adult softball not super big and not small just perfect with a lot of pockets
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rios

customer_reviews.title: Packaged very good and delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very good and delivered on time. The bag is a good quality, color good and roomy with inside pockets.
customer_reviews.author: DeBora K.

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot of room to fit my daughter’s batting ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of room to fit my daughter’s batting helmet, fielders mask, glove, bat, and water bottle. There’s even a pocket on front to put my phone and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Rosetti

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball Team Bag
customer_reviews.text: My volleyball daughter loves this. Keeps her shoes away from her knee pads and uniform. Well built. She can’t wait for the season to begin with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: OnTheGo

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the size of this bag
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the size of this bag! My 9 year old daughter is able to carry it without issues!!
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: 9yr old daughter loves it. Have used it hard for 1 month. Not as thick of a material as I’d hoped, which is why the 4 stars. Worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Cris R

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my nephews who play Little League baseball. They seem to like them. The product seems well made.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Perfect for my boyfriend's equipment. It holds both of our adult shoes, gloves, and some balls. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MRJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my high-school-aged daughter. We got one at a local sporting goods store that was just too big. This one is just right.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SELLER AND PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved my bag!!!! Super fast shipping!!! Will order from this seller again!!! THANK YOU!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, not TOO large.
customer_reviews.text: I have a teenager playing travel baseball. 2 gloves (infleid & 1st base), helmet, 2 bats, one pair of cleats all fit nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the pockets, comfort and style! Plenty of room for ball, shoes, pads, etc.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and a great looking/functional sports bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this backpack for our daughter to use for volleyball. She has enjoyed it, with plenty of room for all of her stuff and able to keep knee pads and shoes separate from the rest. She has received many compliments on the size of the bag and we have had other parents inquire about where we got it. Definitely worth the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag

customer_reviews.title: Purple is blue not purple
customer_reviews.text: Color is not as shown. Ordered purple backpack and it looks royal blue instead. Happy with quality. Not happy with color.

customer_reviews.title: Great item. It fits everything needed for softball
customer_reviews.text: Great item. It fits everything needed for softball. Even the helmet!

customer_reviews.title: great for volleyball too
customer_reviews.text: My daughter actually uses this for volleyball gear, even though it is advertised as a "bat pack" for softball. It is a great size and has plenty of room for a change of clothes, and a separate zip compartment for her volleyball shoes. Side mesh pocket for water bottle works great.

customer_reviews.title: Great for My Needs
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a coaches bag for my game shoes. The separate pockets work perfectly for my needs. Good quality and prompt delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!

customer_reviews.title: The bag was large and sturdy enough to hold all of her items

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Softball or Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used this bag for volleyball and softball both and loves it.

customer_reviews.title: The front pocket is perfect for embroidering names and/or numbers
customer_reviews.text: We purchased six of these bags for a club ball team. They have drug around and beat up by a bunch of seven and eight year old boys and seem to be holding up well. The front pocket is perfect for embroidering names and/or numbers. I love that these bags hold all the necessary equipment such as a batting helmet, glove(s), shoes, two hats, and other accessories. The backpack style is easier for the boys to carry than a traditional bat bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 9 year old who is rather ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 9 year old who is rather petite! Easy to carry and well made. She says its comfortable on her back also. Large enough for all her gear without being too bulky.

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-use bag
customer_reviews.text: Good storage with high quality. We bought this for my daughter for soccer after she saw a similar model my son used for baseball.

customer_reviews.text: Lots of room for my daughters helmet, glove and cleats with room to spare. She will get many years of use from this bag.

product_meta.title: Mizuno Organizer G4 Batpack
product_meta.description: Mizuno Organizer G4 Bat Pack Easyaccess helmet or shoe/cleats pouch Felted valuables pocket helps keep cell phone or any other valuables safe Bat sleeves hold two bats, also large enough for extra water bottles JHook Fence Clip hangs your bag on the fence during the game to keep it out of the dirt Dimensions: (H) 20" x (W) 14" x (D) 9" Colors: color
feature_bullets: Easy access helmet or shoe pouch
